schema.name: Salad Stop Create Your Own
recipeIngredient: 10.00 g, Lentils - Cooked, boiled, with salt

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the beans, and mushrooms under cold water.
Chop the lettuce, turnip, raw red cabbage, bell peppers, and broccoli into bite-sized pieces.
Halve the olives and peel and segment the pomelo.
Combine all the prepared vegetables, beans, mushrooms, olives, lentils, and pomelo in a large salad bowl.
Toss the salad to ensure an even mix of all ingredients. Serve with breadsticks on the side. Enjoy your custom, nutritious salad!

schema.description: This 'Salad Stop Create Your Own' recipe is perfect for those who seek a health-conscious meal without compromising on taste. With a focus on low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar ingredients, this salad is a delightful combination of freshness and nutrition, making it ideal for anyone looking to enjoy healthy recipes with a delicious twist.
